name: Healthcare Realty Trust Incorporated
description: Healthcare Realty Trust Incorporated is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the acquisition, development, and management of healthcare facilities. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee, the company specializes in properties that are primarily leased to healthcare providers, including hospitals, outpatient surgery centers, and medical office buildings. With a mission to enhance the healthcare experience by providing high-quality real estate solutions, Healthcare Realty Trust aims to support the evolving needs of the healthcare industry. The company’s portfolio is strategically positioned across the United States, offering investors exposure to the growing demand for healthcare services driven by an aging population and advancements in medical technology. Healthcare Realty Trust is committed to sustainability and operational excellence, focusing on environmentally friendly practices and efficient building management. The company’s experienced management team is dedicated to maximizing shareholder value through prudent investment strategies and a focus on long-term growth.

faq.answer: Healthcare Realty Trust is headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

faq.answer: Healthcare Realty Trust owns medical office buildings, outpatient surgery centers, and hospitals.

faq.answer: Healthcare Realty Trust was founded in 1992.
